thread.title: ‘Don’t be surprised if we do well with a number of Republicans’
thread.title_full: ‘Don’t be surprised if we do well with a number of Republicans’ - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: ‘Don’t be surprised if we do well with a number of Republicans’
text: Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.), widely regarded as the most liberal candidate in the Democratic presidential field, made a pitch Thursday morning for his potential appeal to a not-so-obvious segment of the electorate: Republicans. Sanders, the self-described democratic socialist from Vermont, was a guest on MSNBC’s “Morning Joe,” where host Joe Scarborough, a former Republican congressman from […] ...
